message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $110. I think it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $95?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go as low as $95. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I see, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Let me see if I can come up with a compromise. How about $100 for the product?
